howItWorks.relative: In these challenging days, when business uncertainty is growing and many questions remain unanswered, we provide AI technology to assist businesses and help them receive the ways, benefits, and paths that are suitable for them to receive the assistance they are entitled to.
howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.description: Register, define your business properties to AI through chat, and receive the existing market benefits for you.

stepList.title: Short Registration
stepList.description: Register in a brief process, including verification, to ensure the security of your business data.

stepList.title: Opening the Chat Screen
stepList.description: After registration, you will have access to the HMAL AI chat.

stepList.title: Entering Business Data for Tailored Benefits
stepList.description: Answer the chat's questions to receive tailored information about benefits and various assistance options for your business.

ai.title: AI Assistance for Businesses
ai.description: Guidance and submission of details to receive assistance from various government programs

header.title: AI Assistance for Businesses
header.description: Guidance and submission of details to receive assistance from various government programs

start.message: Welcome! You have successfully registered. Very nice, I am the Hamal AI.
I will now ask you a few questions about your business to find the assistance plans and benefits that best suit your business.

finish.message: That's it, we're done! ðŸ˜ƒ Now, whenever you sell, feel free to ask me any questions about assistance and benefits for your business.
My answers will be based on the information you provided. If you want to change the information, click on the "Personal Profile" icon in the top left corner.

quiz.message__context_warLocation: Let's begin. In which area is your business located?
quiz.message__context_type: Excellent! How is your business registered?
quiz.message__context_evacuated: Have you been evacuated by an official state entity from your home as of the date 7.11.23?
quiz.message__context_victom: Are you close relatives to the war casualties, captives, or missing persons?
quiz.message__context_recruited: Are you serving in the reserves and were recruited in a letter of call (Tzav 8) in the months of October or November?
quiz.message__context_damageStatus: In what way was your business affected?
quiz.message__context_income: What is your business's annual revenue?
quiz.message__context_obligo: What is the business's obligation? (Total commitments the business has with the bank)
quiz.message__context_loanStatus: Got it, do you have a loan? (Please write whether yes or no and from which financial institution you received the loan)
quiz.message__context_bankAccount: In which bank is the business account? (You can select multiple options; click 'Done' when finished)
quiz.message__context_companyName: What is the name of the business?
quiz.message__context_indetifier: Okay, we're almost done! All that's left is the VAT number or ID number for a licensed business.

help.title:
Quick and detailed assistance for every business
Check the benefits for your business

security.title:
Information based on data concentration
from authorities, banks, non-banking entities, funds, and more

businessSupport.title: Business Supporters
businessSupport.description: Companies, organizations, and funds that can support businesses. We would be happy to provide you with information about business assistance! - Contact us, and we will get back to you.

leadEnd.title: Business Supporters
leadEnd.description: Companies, organizations, and funds that can support businesses. We would be happy to provide you with information about business assistance! - Contact us, and we will get back to you.
leadEnd.message: We have received your request, and we will contact you soon.

login.title: Hey, ready to log in?
login.checkList__context_lowerCase: Contains at least one lowercase letter
login.checkList__context_upperCase: Contains at least one uppercase letter
login.checkList__context_specialChar: Contains at least one special character
login.identifierErrorMessage: Value must be an email or phone number

registration.description__context_profile: Fill in the details about your business, and we're done
registration.description__context_signUp: Please sign up with an email or phone and choose a password
registration.description__context_verify: Verify your account with the code sent to you

input.indetifier-placeholder: Business Number (VAT ID) or ID Number

checkbox.link: the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

error.confirmation: Password and confirmation do not match
error.identifier: Value must be an email or phone number

forgotPassword.description__context_forgot: Please enter the email or phone number associated with your account
forgotPassword.description__context_reset: Guidance and accessibility of information on assistance and funding plans, and a variety of government programs

logoutPrepare.title: Want to log out?
logoutPrepare.description: If you are sure you want to log out, you will need to log in again the next time you come to HMAL.

profile.title: Your Personal Form
profile.description: All the details you fill in here
